channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0323; 07:12AM; 1111 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wSwZiN; #Westlake; Firefighters arrived to find a 4-story building with fire showing from the second floor. It took 40 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the fire. After firefighters entered the structure to eliminate the remainder of the flames, crews ventilated the building to remove any lingering smoke and conducted a search for any victims. No reported injuries to civilians or firefighters. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E203 E211 E3 E9 RA13 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 12; Bert Fierro

Automobile Fire; INC#0344; 07:18AM; 1161 E 101st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IEgRUJ; #GreenMeadows; Firefighters responded to an RV fully engulfed in flames, and beginning to catch fire to the exterior of a nearby commercial building. Crews arrived and quickly stretched hose lines to extinguish the exterior wall of the structure, preventing it from extending inside the building. The first engine company (four firefighters) then finished extinguishing the RV fire. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E64 E65; CH7; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Structure Fire MEDIA STAGING 03/15/2024 INC#0186

item.description: Update MEDIA STAGING Structure Fire; INC#0186; 07:30AM; 3265 N Oakdell Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x3kQrj; #StudioCity; MEDIA: Please stage at the intersection of Oakdell Rd and Oakdell Lane for Public Information requests.; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0323; 06:51AM; 1069 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48F4RxO; #Westlake; Four story commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E211 E3 E9 RA13 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T11 T3 T9; CH9; 12; Bert Fierro

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/15/2024 INC#0186

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0186; 06:13AM; 3265 N Oakdell Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x3kQrj; #StudioCity; Firefighters arrived to find a 6,650 sq-ft two-story home built in 1971, with heavy fire in the rear, which consumed one room in the rear and developed into a deep-seated attic fire. Crews confirmed all occupants were out of the home, and then pulled back into defensive mode due to the long duration of heavy fire exposing the structural members. The house subsequently sustained a roof collapse, as firefighters continued to apply hose streams from the exterior. Ultimately, it took 94 firefighters 2 hours and 16 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. One firefighter was transported in fair condition, and one occupant sustained minor smoke inhalation. Cause under investigation. PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is en route, ETA 7:00 AM. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E108 E239 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E41 E60 E76 E86 E89 E95 E97 EA2 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA878 RA889 RA89 RA97 SO1 SQ95 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0186; 03:57AM; 3265 N Oakdell Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x3kQrj; #StudioCity; Two-story single-family home with heavy fire in the rear, extending into the attic. Offensive mode. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E108 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E41 E60 E76 E86 E89 E95 E97 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA878 RA889 RA89 RA97 SO1 SQ95 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1903; 12:50AM; 2377 S Westwood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/43k753y; #WestLosAngeles; At 11:31pm, LAFD responded to a one-story row-of-commercials with Fire through the roof. Ninety LAFD Firefighters took 1 hour and 19 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. The cause of the blaze is under investigation.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AR1 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 E205 E237 E261 E263 E292 E294 E37 E43 E5 E58 E59 E62 E71 E95 EA2 EM11 EM9 HE1 HR3 RA5 RA59 RA892 RA92 SO1 SQ95 T37 T5 T61 T63 T92 T94 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1188; 03:41PM; 1150 E 105th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TznE8z; #GreenMeadows; The first 16 firefighters arrived, and deployed hose lines and made access to the one-story home, making an aggressive interior fire attack to contain the fire to the room-of-origin, and extinguish the flames in 13 minutes. No other structures damaged. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC13 E21 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA264 RA864 SO1 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1188; 03:28PM; 1150 E 105th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TznE8z; #GreenMeadows; One-story single-family home with fire showing, and one other structure threatened. Offensive mode.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC13 E21 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA264 RA864 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Landslide; INC#0153; 02:51AM; 3741 N Ventura Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4cgDn3U; #ShermanOaks; Firefighters responded to reports of a large tree down and wires down in the backyard of a residence. Responders arrived to find a large portion of a hillside had slid down toward at least three homes. Several people have been evacuated from at least one of the homes. A primary search of the homes revealed no patients, but a more thorough (secondary) search will be conducted after daybreak. Department of Building and Safety is responding to assess the structures and hillsides. PIO Captain Cody Weireter is now on scene.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 CM40 CM42 E278 E288 E99 PI3 RA78 T78 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
